description:
Their most advanced freeride hardshell, the stretch 3-layer Lassen Xpore Jacket offers maximum lightweight breathability and protection for backcountry touring. Eco-designed with recycled Circular polyester face fabric, it also features an Xpore 25K/20K membrane for unmatched waterproof breathability, reinforced with a PFC-free durable water repellent treatment. While providing maximum protection against the snow and wind, this jacket has pit zips for easy temperature control up any skin track or when breaking trail. We specifically designed the highly-breathable collar for intense efforts on the up or down: just unzip the collar and snap the top to breathe easy.

The holes in the flap help to evacuate moisture quickly. For enhanced protection and fit, the helmet-compatible hood, the cuffs, and hem are all adjustable. The strategically placed pockets are practical. This freeride jacket is ready for all your big mountain adventures and is built for the most unpredictable high-output pursuits when ski touring and splitboarding.
name: Picture Organic Clothing Lassen 3L Xpore Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Hard shell 3 layers stretch - 70% Circular Polyester, 30% Polyester
